May 12, 2007 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Nigel Thomas - (euphonium) Newbridge (Celynen) Best Horn: Bruce Myers—BTM Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £120, 3rd £110. 6 bands competed
July 20, 2010, 3:31 p.m. June 30, 2020, 3:18 p.m.
1 BTM Band Jason Katsikaris The Night to Sing
2 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland Dances and Alleluias
3 Tredegar Town Band Allan Ramsay The Night to Sing
4 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Rhodri Griffiths Diversions on a Bass Theme
5 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies
